text:
We will show you four
ways to transfer pictures
from one iPhone to another,
including using iCloud, AirDrop,
messaging, or shared albums.
Use the clickable sections below
to skip ahead to your preferred method.
Using iCloud is the best method
when you're transferring photos
from an old phone to a new phone.

Starting with your old
phone, first open settings.

Tap your name to open
your Apple ID profile,
then tap "iCloud."
On the next page, you will see
how much iCloud storage space you're using

and a list of apps that
are storing data in iCloud.
Tap "Photos" here.
Make sure that the button
next to "iCloud Photos" is enabled.
You'll need to purchase some more storage
if you don't have enough iCloud memory
to save all your photos and videos.
Once you've enabled iCloud photo backups,

all your photos will be saved
to your Apple ID account.
Once you're done saving on your old phone,
turn on your new iPhone and go through
the basic setup instructions
until you reach the "Apps & Data" page.
Select "Restore from iCloud Backup,"
then sign in to your iCloud.
Choose the iCloud backup
that contains all the photos you want.

After a few minutes,
all your photos, videos,

and other backed-up
content will be transferred
to your new iPhone.

Make sure the AirDrop feature
is enabled on both iPhones
and have them able to see everyone.
Go to the photo you wish to share,
then tap the share icon.

Select the AirDrop icon,
then tap the person's name
once it appears in the AirDrop space.
Once they accept the AirDrop offer,
the photo will transfer.
Open the picture, then tap the share icon.
Tap the green message app.

Then select the person you
want to share the photo with.
Then tap send.
To email the picture,
tap the email letter icon,
type in the email you wish to send it to,
then tap send.

If you regularly share
pictures on your iPhone

with the same person,
create a shared album.

Anytime you move a photo
or video into the album,

the people sharing the album
will have instant access.
Open the photos app and tap "Albums."
Tap the plus icon to create a new album.
Tap "New Shared Album."
Name the album, then tap "Next."
Enter all the contacts with whom
you want the album to be shared.
Then tap "Create."

Going forward, any image
you move into this album
will be accessible to everyone
who accepted your invite to join.
